name: HoverLeague
description:
Welcome to the HoverLeague Game Page
I really enjoy the charm of physics based games like RocketLeague, which HoverLeague is heavily inspired by, and sought to create a miniature version of my favorite parts. Which means fast speed, rocket jumps, and good / lucky timing!

How to Play
You play as a blue hoverboard in the floating HoverLeague stadium. At the start of the game your player and ten balls will spawn in the middle of the field. Try your best to knock the balls into each other and hopefully score a goal. Be careful not to accidentally score against yourself. And remember your team is blue and the rival team is red. Have fun and I hope you enjoy the game!

Music Used
A New Chapter (Original Mix) by Josh Dirschka
https://soundcloud.com/josh-dirschka/a-new-chapter-original-mix-free-download

Controls

InputActionWASD / Arrow Keys
Move
Spacebar (Tap or Hold)
Jump / Boost Up
Escape or P
Pause Game
